BMP280

Bosch Digital Pressure Sensor

  • Device address 119
  • Address type 7-bit

Addr 136

16-bytes

Read-only

Digital Temperature Compensation 1

Used for Celcius conversion

Addr 138

16-bytes

Read-only
Signed value

Digital Temperature Compensation 2

Used for Celcius conversion

Addr 140

16-bytes

Read-only
Signed value

Digital Temperature Compensation 3

Used for Celcius conversion

Addr 142

16-bytes

Read-only

Digital Pressure Compensation 1

Used for Pascals conversion

16-bytes

Read-only
Signed value

Used for Pascals conversion

16-bytes

Read-only
Signed value

Used for Pascals conversion

Signed value

Digital Pressure Compensation 9

Used for Pascals conversion

Addr 247

8-bytes

Read-only

Pressure MSB

Part 1 of Pressure

Addr 248

8-bytes

Read-only

Pressure LSB

Part 2 of Pressure

Addr 249

8-bytes

Read-only

Pressure XLSB

Part 3 of Pressure

Addr 250

8-bytes

Read-only

Temperature MSB

Part 1 of temperature

Addr 251

8-bytes

Read-only

Temperature LSB

Part 2 of temperature

Addr 252

8-bytes

Read-only

Temperature XLSB

Final part of temperature

Functions

  • pressure.asHpa - Reads the atmospheric pressure
  • pressure.asRaw - Reads the atmospheric pressure
  • temperature.asCelsius - Reads the temperature
  • temperature.asRaw - Reads the temperature
